Includes name, status, education role, email address and photo.

DelegatedWork.adminDescription: This is deprecated!  Do not use! This permission no longer has any effect. You can safely consent to it. No additional privileges will be granted to the app.

DelegatedWork.consentDescription: This permission no longer has any effect. You can safely consent to it. No additional privileges will be granted to the app.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Deliver and manage user notifications for this app
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to deliver its notifications on behalf of signed-in users. Also allows the app to read, update, and delete the user's notification items for this app.

DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to deliver its notifications, on your behalf. Also allows the app to read, update, and delete your notification items for this app.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Manage on-premises published resources
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to manage hybrid identity service configuration by creating, viewing, updating and deleting on-premises published resources, on-premises agents and agent groups, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Manage on-premises published resources
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to manage hybrid identity service configuration by creating, viewing, updating and deleting on-premises published resources, on-premises agents and agent groups, on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read organization information
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the organization and related resources, on behalf of the signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed skus and tenant branding information.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read organization information
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read the organization and related resources, on your behalf. Related resources include things like subscribed skus and tenant branding information.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write organization information
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write the organization and related resources, on behalf of the signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed skus and tenant branding information.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write organization information
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write the organization and related resources, on your behalf. Related resources include things like subscribed skus and tenant branding information.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read organizational contacts
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all organizational contacts on behalf of the signed-in user.  These contacts are managed by the organization and are different from a user's personal contacts.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read organizational contacts
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read all organizational contacts on your behalf.  These contacts are managed by the organization and are different from your personal contacts.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read users' relevant people lists
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read a ranked list of relevant people of the signed-in user. The list includes local contacts, contacts from social networking, your organization's directory, and people from recent communications (such as email and Skype).
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read your relevant people list
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read a list of people in the order that's most relevant to you. This includes your local contacts, your contacts from social networking, people listed in your organization's directory, and people from recent communications.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read all users' relevant people lists
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read a scored list of relevant people of the signed-in user or other users in the signed-in user's organization. The list can include local contacts, contacts from social networking, your organization's directory, and people from recent communications (such as email and Skype).
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read all users' relevant people lists
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read a list of people in the order that is most relevant to you. Allows the app to read a list of people in the order that is most relevant to another user in your organization. These can include local contacts, contacts from social networking, people listed in your organization's directory, and people from recent communications.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read all company places
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your company's places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read all company places
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read your company's places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications, on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write organization places
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to manage organization places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write organization places
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to manage organization places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications, on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read your organization's policies
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's policies on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read your organization's policies
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's policies on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read your organization's conditional access policies
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's conditional access policies on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read your organization's conditional access policies
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's conditional access policies on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read consent and permission grant policies
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read policies related to consent and permission grants for applications, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read consent and permission grant policies
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read policies related to consent and permission grants for applications, on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write your organization's directory access review default policy
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's directory access review default policy on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write your organization's directory access review default policy
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's directory access review default policy on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write your organization's application configuration policies
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's application configuration policies on behalf of the signed-in user.  This includes policies such as activityBasedTimeoutPolicy, claimsMappingPolicy, homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy,  tokenIssuancePolicy and tokenLifetimePolicy.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write your organization's application configuration policies
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's application configuration policies on your behalf.  This includes policies such as activityBasedTimeoutPolicy, claimsMappingPolicy, homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy, tokenIssuancePolicy  and tokenLifetimePolicy.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write authentication flow policies
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write the authentication flow policies, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write your authentication flow policies
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write the authentication flow policies for your tenant, on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write authentication method policies
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write the authentication method policies, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write your authentication method policies
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write the authentication method policies for your tenant, on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write your organization's authorization policy
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's authorization policy on behalf of the signed-in user.  For example, authorization policies can control some of the permissions that the out-of-the-box user role has by default.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write your organization's authorization policy
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's authorization policy on your behalf. For example, authorization policies can control some of the permissions that the out-of-the-box user role has by default.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write your organization's conditional access policies
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's conditional access policies on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write your organization's conditional access policies
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's conditional access policies on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write consent request policy
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's consent requests policy on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write consent request policy
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's consent request policy on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write your organization's cross tenant access policies
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's cross tenant access policies on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write your organization's cross tenant access policies
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's cross tenant access policies on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write your organization's device configuration policies
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's device configuration policies on behalf of the signed-in user.  For example, device registration policy can limit initial provisioning controls using quota restrictions, additional authentication and authorization checks.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write your organization's device configuration policies
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's device configuration policies on your behalf.  For example, device registration policy can limit initial provisioning controls using quota restrictions, additional authentication and authorization checks.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write your organization's external identities policy
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the application to read and update the organization's external identities policy on behalf of the signed-in user.  For example, external identities policy controls if users invited to access resources in your organization via B2B collaboration or B2B direct connect are allowed to self-service leave.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write your organization's external identities policy
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the application to read and update the organization's external identities policy on your behalf.  For example, external identities policy controls if users invited to access resources in your organization via B2B collaboration or B2B direct connect are allowed to self-service leave.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write your organization's feature rollout policies
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's feature rollout policies on behalf of the signed-in user. Includes abilities to assign and remove users and groups to rollout of a specific feature.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write your organization's feature rollout policies
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's feature rollout policies on your behalf. Includes abilities to assign and remove users and groups to rollout of a specific feature.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write your organization's mobility management policies
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's mobility management policies on behalf of the signed-in user.  For example, a mobility management policy can set the enrollment scope for a given mobility management application.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write your organization's mobility management policies
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's mobility management policies on your behalf.  For example, a mobility management policy can set the enrollment scope for a given mobility management application.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Manage consent and permission grant policies
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to manage policies related to consent and permission grants for applications, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Manage consent and permission grant policies
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to manage policies related to consent and permission grants for applications, on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write your organization's trust framework policies
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's trust framework policies on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write trust framework policies
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's trust framework policies on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write access to mailboxes via POP.
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to have the same access to mailboxes as the signed-in user via POP protocol.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write access to your mail.
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read, update, create and delete email in your mailbox. Does not include permission to send mail.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read user's presence information
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read presence information on behalf of the signed-in user. Presence information includes activity, availability, status note, calendar out-of-office message, timezone and location.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read your presence information
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read your presence information on your behalf. Presence information includes activity, availability, status note, calendar out-of-office message, timezone and location.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read presence information of all users in your organization
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read presence information of all users in the directory on behalf of the signed-in user. Presence information includes activity, availability, status note, calendar out-of-office message, timezone and location.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read presence information of all users in your organization
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read presence information of all users in the directory on your behalf. Presence information includes activity, availability, status note, calendar out-of-office message, timezone and location.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write a user's presence information
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the presence information and write activity and availability on behalf of the signed-in user. Presence information includes activity, availability, status note, calendar out-of-office message, timezone and location.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write your presence information
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read the presence information and write activity and availability on your behalf. Presence information includes activity, availability, status note, calendar out-of-office message, timezone and location.

DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the application to read print connectors on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the application to create (register) printers on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the application to read and update printers on behalf of the signed-in user. Does not allow creating (registering) or deleting (unregistering) printers.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and update printers
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the application to read and update printers on your behalf. Does not allow creating (registering) or deleting (unregistering) printers.

DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and update printer shares
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the application to read and update printer shares on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the application to create print jobs on behalf of the signed-in user and upload document content to print jobs that the signed-in user created.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Create your print jobs
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the application to create print jobs on your behalf and upload document content to print jobs  that you created.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read user's print jobs
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the application to read the metadata and document content of print jobs that the signed-in user created.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read your print jobs
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the application to read the metadata and document content of print jobs that you created.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read print jobs
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the application to read the metadata and document content of print jobs on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read print jobs
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the application to read the metadata and document content of print jobs on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read basic information of user's print jobs

DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read basic information of your print jobs
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the application to read the metadata of print jobs that you created. Does not allow access to print job document content.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read basic information of print jobs
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the application to read the metadata of print jobs on behalf of the signed-in user. Does not allow access to print job document content.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read basic information of print jobs
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the application to read the metadata of print jobs on your behalf. Does not allow access to print job document content.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write user's print jobs
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the application to read and update the metadata and document content of print jobs that the signed-in user created.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and update your print jobs
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the application to read and update the metadata and document content of print jobs that you created.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write print jobs
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the application to read and update the metadata and document content of print jobs on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and update print jobs
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the application to read and update the metadata and document content of print jobs on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the application to read and update the metadata of print jobs that the signed-in user created. Does not allow access to print job document content.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write basic information of your print jobs
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the application to read and update the metadata of print jobs that you created. Does not allow access to print job document content.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write basic information of print jobs
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the application to read and update the metadata of print jobs on behalf of the signed-in user. Does not allow access to print job document content.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write basic information of print jobs
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the application to read and update the metadata of print jobs on your behalf. Does not allow access to print job document content.

DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the application to read tenant-wide print settings on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read tenant-wide print settings
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the application to read tenant-wide print settings on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the application to read and write tenant-wide print settings on behalf of the signed-in user.

DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the application to read and write tenant-wide print settings on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write privileged access to Azure AD
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to request and manage just in time elevation (including scheduled elevation) of users to Azure AD built-in administrative roles, on behalf of signed-in users.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write privileged access to Azure AD
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to request and manage just in time elevation (including scheduled elevation) of users to Azure AD built-in administrative roles, on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to request and manage time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation (including scheduled elevation) of Azure AD groups, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write privileged access to Azure AD groups
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to request and manage time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation (including scheduled elevation) of Azure AD groups, on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to request and manage time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation of user privileges to manage Azure resources (like subscriptions, resource groups, storage, compute) on behalf of the signed-in users.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write privileged access to Azure resources
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to request and manage time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation of user privileges to manage  your Azure resources (like your subscriptions, resource groups, storage, compute) on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read all programs that user can access
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read programs and program controls that the signed-in user has access to in the organization.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read programs that you can access
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read information on programs and program controls that you have access to.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Manage all programs that user can access
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read, update, delete and perform actions on programs and program controls that the signed-in user has access to in the organization.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Manage programs that you can access
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read, update and perform action on programs and program controls that you have access to.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read all Questions and Answers that the user can access.
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows an app to read all question and answer sets that the signed-in user can access.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read all Questions and Answers that you can access.
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read all question and answer sets that you can access.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read Records Management configuration, labels, and policies
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the application to read any data from Records Management, such as configuration, labels, and policies on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read Records Management configuration, labels, and policies
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the application to read any data from Records Management, such as configuration, labels and policies on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allow the application to create, update and delete any data from Records Management, such as configuration, labels, and policies on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write Records Management configuration, labels, and policies
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allow the application to create, update and delete any data from Records Management, such as configuration, labels, and policies on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read all usage reports
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows an app to read all service usage reports on behalf of the signed-in user.  Services that provide usage reports include Office 365 and Azure Active Directory.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read all usage reports
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows an app to read all service usage reports on your behalf. Services that provide usage reports include Office 365 and Azure Active Directory.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read admin report settings
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read admin report settings, such as whether to display concealed information in reports, on behalf of the signed-in user
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read admin report settings
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read admin report settings, such as whether to display concealed information in reports, on your behalf.

DelegatedWork.adminDisplayName: Read and write admin report settings
DelegatedWork.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and update admin report settings, such as whether to display concealed information in reports, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedWork.consentDisplayName: Read and write admin report settings
DelegatedWork.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and update admin report settings, such as whether to display concealed information in reports, on your behalf.

DelegatedPersonal.consentDescription: Allows the app to read a basic set of profile properties of other users in your organization on your behalf. Includes display name, first and last name, email address and photo.

DelegatedPersonal.adminDisplayName: Read and write access to user profile
DelegatedPersonal.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your profile. It also allows the app to update your profile information on your behalf.
DelegatedPersonal.consentDisplayName: Read and update your profile
DelegatedPersonal.consentDescription: Allows the app to read your profile, and discover your group membership, reports and manager. It also allows the app to update your profile information on your behalf.

DelegatedPersonal.adminDisplayName: Read and write all users' full profiles
DelegatedPersonal.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on behalf of the signed-in user.
DelegatedPersonal.consentDisplayName: Read and write all users' full profiles
DelegatedPersonal.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and write the full set of profile properties, reports, and managers of other users in your organization, on your behalf.

DelegatedPersonal.adminDisplayName: Read and write app activity to users' activity feed
DelegatedPersonal.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and report the signed-in user's activity in the app.
DelegatedPersonal.consentDisplayName: Read and write app activity to your activity feed
DelegatedPersonal.consentDescription: Allows the app to read and report your activity in the app.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all access reviews

Application.adminDisplayName: Manage all access reviews

Application.adminDisplayName: Manage access reviews for group and app memberships
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read, update, delete and perform actions on access reviews, reviewers, decisions and settings in the organization for group and app memberships, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all administrative units
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read administrative units and administrative unit membership without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all administrative units
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete administrative units and manage administrative unit membership without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write API connectors for authentication flows
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read, create and manage the API connectors used in user authentication flows, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all app catalogs
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read apps in the app catalogs without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write to all app catalogs
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete apps in the app catalogs without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all applications
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all applications and service principals without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all applications
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete applications and service principals without a signed-in user.  Does not allow management of consent grants.

Application.adminDisplayName: Manage apps that this app creates or owns
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create other applications, and fully manage those applications (read, update, update application secrets and delete), without a signed-in user.  It cannot update any apps that it is not an owner of.

Application.adminDisplayName: Manage app permission grants and app role assignments
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to manage permission grants for application permissions to any API (including Microsoft Graph) and application assignments for any app, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read attack simulation data of an organization
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read attack simulation and training data for an organization without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read, create, and update all attack simulation data of an organization
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read, create, and update attack simulation and training data for an organization without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all audit log data
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and query your audit log activities, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all Bookings related resources.
Application.adminDescription: Allows an app to read Bookings appointments, businesses, customers, services, and staff without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all Bookings related resources.
Application.adminDescription: Allows an app to read and write Bookings appointments and customers, and additionally allows reading businesses, services, and staff without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all browser site lists for your organization
Application.adminDescription: Allows an app to read all browser site lists configured for your organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all browser site lists for your organization
Application.adminDescription: Allows an app to read and write all browser site lists configured for your organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all business scenario configurations this app creates or owns
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the configurations of business scenarios it owns, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all business scenario configurations this app creates or owns
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create new business scenarios and fully manage the configurations of scenarios it owns, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read data for all business scenarios this app creates or owns
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the data associated with the business scenarios it owns, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write data for all business scenarios this app creates or owns
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to fully manage the data associated with the business scenarios it owns, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read calendars in all mailboxes
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read events of all calendars without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read basic details of calendars in all mailboxes
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read events of all calendars, except for properties such as body, attachments, and extensions, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write calendars in all mailboxes
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete events of all calendars without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all call records
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read call records for all calls and online meetings without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Access media streams in a call as an app
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to get direct access to media streams in a call, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Initiate outgoing 1 to 1 calls from the app
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to place outbound calls to a single user and transfer calls to users in your organization's directory, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Initiate outgoing group calls from the app
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to place outbound calls to multiple users and add participants to meetings in your organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Join group calls and meetings as an app
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to join group calls and scheduled meetings in your organization, without a signed-in user.  The app will be joined with the privileges of a directory user to meetings in your organization.

Application.adminDisplayName: Join group calls and meetings as a guest
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to anonymously join group calls and scheduled meetings in your organization, without a signed-in user.  The app will be joined as a guest to meetings in your organization.

Application.adminDisplayName: Create channels
Application.adminDescription: Create channels in any team, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Delete channels
Application.adminDescription: Delete channels in any team, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDescription: Read all channel names and channel descriptions, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read the members of all channels
Application.adminDescription: Read the members of all channels, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Add and remove members from all channels
Application.adminDescription: Add and remove members from all channels, without a signed-in user. Also allows changing a member's role, for example from owner to non-owner.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all channel messages
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all channel messages in Microsoft Teams

Application.adminDisplayName: Flag channel messages for violating policy
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to update Microsoft Teams channel messages by patching a set of Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policy violation properties to handle the output of DLP processing.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read the names, descriptions, and settings of all channels
Application.adminDescription: Read all channel names, channel descriptions, and channel settings, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write the names, descriptions, and settings of all channels
Application.adminDescription: Read and write the names, descriptions, and settings of all channels, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Create chats
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create chats without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all chat messages
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all 1-to-1 or group chat messages in Microsoft Teams.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all chat messages for chats where the associated Teams application is installed.
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all one-to-one or group chat messages in Microsoft Teams for chats where the associated Teams application is installed, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDescription: Read names and members of all one-to-one and group chats in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read names and members of all chat threads where the associated Teams application is installed.
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read names and members of all one-to-one and group chats in Microsoft Teams where the associated Teams application is installed, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all chat messages
Application.adminDescription: Allows an app to read and write all chat messages in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all chat messages for chats where the associated Teams application is installed.
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write all chat messages in Microsoft Teams for chats where the associated Teams application is installed, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Flag chat messages for violating policy
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to update Microsoft Teams 1-to-1 or group chat messages by patching a set of Data Loss Prevention (DLP) policy violation properties to handle the output of DLP processing.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read the members of all chats
Application.adminDescription: Read the members of all chats, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read the members of all chats where the associated Teams application is installed.
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the members of all chats where the associated Teams application is installed, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Add and remove members from all chats
Application.adminDescription: Add and remove members from all chats, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Add and remove members from all chats where the associated Teams application is installed.
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to add and remove members from all chats where the associated Teams application is installed, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all chat messages
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all one-to-one and group chats messages in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read Cloud PCs
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the properties of Cloud PCs, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write Cloud PCs
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write the properties of Cloud PCs, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all consent requests
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read consent requests and approvals without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all consent requests
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read app consent requests and approvals, and deny or approve those requests without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read contacts in all mailboxes
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all contacts in all mailboxes without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write contacts in all mailboxes
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete all contacts in all mailboxes without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read cross-tenant basic information
Application.adminDescription: Allows the application to obtain basic tenant information about another target tenant within the Azure AD ecosystem without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read custom security attribute assignments
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read custom security attribute assignments for all principals in the tenant without a signed in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write custom security attribute assignments
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write custom security attribute assignments for all principals in the tenant without a signed in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read custom security attribute definitions
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read custom security attribute definitions for the tenant without a signed in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write custom security attribute definitions
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write custom security attribute definitions for the tenant without a signed in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read Delegated Admin relationships with customers
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read details of delegated admin relationships with customers like access details (that includes roles) and the duration as well as specific role assignments to security groups without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Manage Delegated Admin relationships with customers
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to manage (create-update-terminate) Delegated Admin relationships with customers and role assignments to security groups for active Delegated Admin relationships without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Manage all delegated permission grants
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to manage permission grants for delegated permissions exposed by any API (including Microsoft Graph), without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all devices
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's devices' configuration information without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write devices
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write all device properties without a signed in user.  Does not allow device creation, device deletion or update of device alternative security identifiers.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read Microsoft Intune apps
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the properties, group assignments and status of apps, app configurations and app protection policies managed by Microsoft Intune, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write Microsoft Intune apps
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write the properties, group assignments and status of apps, app configurations and app protection policies managed by Microsoft Intune, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read Microsoft Intune device configuration and policies
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read properties of Microsoft Intune-managed device configuration and device compliance policies and their assignment to groups, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write Microsoft Intune device configuration and policies
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write properties of Microsoft Intune-managed device configuration and device compliance policies and their assignment to groups, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Perform user-impacting remote actions on Microsoft Intune devices
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to perform remote high impact actions such as wiping the device or resetting the passcode on devices managed by Microsoft Intune, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read Microsoft Intune devices
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the properties of devices managed by Microsoft Intune, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write Microsoft Intune devices
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write the properties of devices managed by Microsoft Intune, without a signed-in user. Does not allow high impact operations such as remote wipe and password reset on the device's owner

Application.adminDisplayName: Read Microsoft Intune RBAC settings
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the properties relating to the Microsoft Intune Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) settings, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write Microsoft Intune RBAC settings
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write the properties relating to the Microsoft Intune Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) settings, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read Microsoft Intune configuration
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read Microsoft Intune service properties including device enrollment and third party service connection configuration, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write Microsoft Intune configuration
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write Microsoft Intune service properties including device enrollment and third party service connection configuration, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read directory data
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read data in your organization's directory, such as users, groups and apps, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write directory data
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write data in your organization's directory, such as users, and groups, without a signed-in user.  Does not allow user or group deletion.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all Azure AD recommendations
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all Azure AD recommendations, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and update all Azure AD recommendations
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and update all Azure AD recommendations, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read domains
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all domain properties without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write domains
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write all domain properties without a signed in user.  Also allows the app to add,  verify and remove domains.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read Education app settings
Application.adminDescription: Read the state and settings of all Microsoft education apps.

Application.adminDisplayName: Manage education app settings
Application.adminDescription: Manage the state and settings of all Microsoft education apps.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all class assignments with grades
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all class assignments with grades for all users without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all class assignments without grades
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all class assignments without grades for all users without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete all class assignments with grades for all users without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Create, read, update and delete all class assignments without grades
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete all class assignments without grades for all users without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read a limited subset of properties from both the structure of schools and classes in the organization's roster and education-specific information about all users. Includes name, status, role, email address and photo.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write the organization's roster
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write the structure of schools and classes in the organization's roster and education-specific information about all users to be read and written.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all entitlement management resources
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read access packages and related entitlement management resources without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all entitlement management resources
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write access packages and related entitlement management resources without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all external connections without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write all external connections without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write external connections
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write external connections without a signed-in user. The app can only read and write external connections that it is authorized to, or it can create new external connections.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all external items
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all external items without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write items in external datasets
Application.adminDescription: Allow the app to read or write items in all external datasets that the app is authorized to access

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write external items

Application.adminDisplayName: Read files in all site collections
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all files in all site collections without a signed in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write files in all site collections
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read, create, update and delete all files in all site collections without a signed in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Create groups

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read group properties and memberships, and read conversations for all groups, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create groups, read all group properties and memberships, update group properties and memberships, and delete groups. Also allows the app to read and write conversations. All of these operations can be performed by the app without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all group memberships
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read memberships and basic group properties for all groups without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all group memberships
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to list groups, read basic properties, read and update the membership of the groups this app has access to without a signed-in user. Group properties and owners cannot be updated and groups cannot be deleted.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's identity (authentication) providers' properties without a signed in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write identity providers
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's identity (authentication) providers' properties without a signed in user.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the identity risk event information for your organization without a signed in user.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and update identity risk detection information for your organization without a signed-in user. Update operations include confirming risk event detections.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all risky service principal information for your organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all identity risky service principal information
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and update identity risky service principal for your organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all identity risky user information
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the identity risky user information for your organization without a signed in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all risky user information
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and update identity risky user information for your organization without a signed-in user.  Update operations include dismissing risky users.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all identity user flows
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's user flows, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all identity user flows
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read or write your organization's user flows, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all published labels and label policies for an organization.
Application.adminDescription: Allows an app to read published sensitivity labels and label policy settings for the entire organization or a specific user, without a signed in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all learning content
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all learning content in the organization's directory, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Manage all learning content
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to manage all learning content in the organization's directory, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all lifecycle workflows resources
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to list and read all workflows, tasks and related lifecycle workflows resources without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all lifecycle workflows resources
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create, update, list, read and delete all workflows, tasks and related lifecycle workflows resources without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read mail in all mailboxes
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read mail in all mailboxes without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write mail in all mailboxes
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete mail in all mailboxes without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.

Application.adminDisplayName: Send mail as any user
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to send mail as any user without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all user mailbox settings
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read user's mailbox settings without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all user mailbox settings
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete user's mailbox settings without a signed-in user. Does not include permission to send mail.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all hidden memberships
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the memberships of hidden groups and administrative units without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all OneNote notebooks
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all the OneNote notebooks in your organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all OneNote notebooks
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all the OneNote notebooks in your organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read online meeting artifacts
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read online meeting artifacts in your organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read online meeting details
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read online meeting details in your organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and create online meetings
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and create online meetings as an application in your organization.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all transcripts of online meetings.
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all transcripts of all online meetings, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Manage on-premises published resources
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create, view, update and delete on-premises published resources, on-premises agents and agent groups, as part of a hybrid identity configuration, without a signed in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read organization information
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the organization and related resources, without a signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed skus and tenant branding information.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write organization information
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write the organization and related resources, without a signed-in user. Related resources include things like subscribed skus and tenant branding information.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all organizational contacts without a signed-in user.  These contacts are managed by the organization and are different from a user's personal contacts.

Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read any user's scored list of relevant people, without a signed-in user. The list can include local contacts, contacts from social networking, your organization's directory, and people from recent communications (such as email and Skype).

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all company places
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read company places (conference rooms and room lists) for calendar events and other applications, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read your organization's policies
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all your organization's policies without a signed in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read your organization's conditional access policies
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's conditional access policies, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read consent and permission grant policies
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read policies related to consent and permission grants for applications, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write your organization's directory access review default policy
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's directory access review default policy without a signed-in user.
