Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's application configuration policies, without a signed-in user.  This includes policies such as activityBasedTimeoutPolicy, claimsMappingPolicy, homeRealmDiscoveryPolicy, tokenIssuancePolicy  and tokenLifetimePolicy.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write authentication flow policies
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write all authentication flow policies for the tenant, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all authentication method policies
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write all authentication method policies for the tenant, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write your organization's authorization policy
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's authorization policy without a signed in user. For example, authorization policies can control some of the permissions that the out-of-the-box user role has by default.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write your organization's conditional access policies
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's conditional access policies, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write your organization's consent request policy
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's consent requests policy without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write your organization's cross tenant access policies
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's cross tenant access policies without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write your organization's external identities policy
Application.adminDescription: Allows the application to read and update the organization's external identities policy without a signed-in user.  For example, external identities policy controls if users invited to access resources in your organization via B2B collaboration or B2B direct connect are allowed to self-service leave.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write feature rollout policies
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write feature rollout policies without a signed-in user. Includes abilities to assign and remove users and groups to rollout of a specific feature.

Application.adminDisplayName: Manage consent and permission grant policies
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to manage policies related to consent and permission grants for applications, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write your organization's trust framework policies
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write your organization's trust framework policies without a signed in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write presence information for all users
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all presence information and write activity and availability of all users in the directory without a signed-in user. Presence information includes activity, availability, status note, calendar out-of-office message, time zone and location.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read printers
Application.adminDescription: Allows the application to read printers without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and update printers
Application.adminDescription: Allows the application to read and update printers without a signed-in user. Does not allow creating (registering) or deleting (unregistering) printers.

Application.adminDisplayName: Perform advanced operations on print jobs
Application.adminDescription: Allows the application to perform advanced operations like redirecting a print job to another printer without a signed-in user. Also allows the application to read and update the metadata of print jobs.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read print jobs
Application.adminDescription: Allows the application to read the metadata and document content of print jobs without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read basic information for print jobs
Application.adminDescription: Allows the application to read the metadata of print jobs without a signed-in user. Does not allow access to print job document content.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write print jobs
Application.adminDescription: Allows the application to read and update the metadata and document content of print jobs without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write basic information for print jobs
Application.adminDescription: Allows the application to read and update the metadata of print jobs without a signed-in user. Does not allow access to print job document content.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read, write and update print task definitions
Application.adminDescription: Allows the application to read and update print task definitions without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read privileged access to Azure AD roles
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation (including scheduled elevation) of Azure AD built-in and custom administrative roles in your organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read privileged access to Azure AD groups
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation (including scheduled elevation) of Azure AD groups in your organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read privileged access to Azure resources
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read time-based assignment and just-in-time elevation of user privileges to audit Azure resources in your organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all programs
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read programs and program controls in the organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Manage all programs
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read, update, delete and perform actions on programs and program controls in the organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read Records Management configuration, labels and policies
Application.adminDescription: Allows the application to read any data from Records Management, such as configuration, labels, and policies without the signed in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write Records Management configuration, labels and policies
Application.adminDescription: Allow the application to create, update and delete any data from Records Management, such as configuration, labels, and policies without the signed in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all usage reports
Application.adminDescription: Allows an app to read all service usage reports without a signed-in user.  Services that provide usage reports include Office 365 and Azure Active Directory.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all admin report settings
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all admin report settings, such as whether to display concealed information in reports, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all admin report settings
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and update all admin report settings, such as whether to display concealed information in reports, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read role management data for all RBAC providers
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read role-based access control (RBAC) settings for all RBAC providers without a signed-in user. This includes reading role definitions and role assignments.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read Cloud PC RBAC settings
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the Cloud PC role-based access control (RBAC) settings, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all directory RBAC settings
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the role-based access control (RBAC) settings for your company's directory, without a signed-in user.  This includes reading directory role templates, directory roles and memberships.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all Cloud PC RBAC settings
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and manage the Cloud PC role-based access control (RBAC) settings, without a signed-in user. This includes reading and managing Cloud PC role definitions and memberships.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all directory RBAC settings
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and manage the role-based access control (RBAC) settings for your company's directory, without a signed-in user. This includes instantiating directory roles and managing directory role membership, and reading directory role templates, directory roles and memberships.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all schedule items
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all schedules, schedule groups, shifts and associated entities in the Teams or Shifts application without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all schedule items
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to manage all schedules, schedule groups, shifts and associated entities in the Teams or Shifts application without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read your organization's search configuration
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read search configurations, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write your organization's search configuration
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write search configurations, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read your organization's security actions
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read security actions, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and update your organization's security actions
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read or update security actions, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all security alerts
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all security alerts, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write to all security alerts
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write to all security alerts, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read your organization's security events
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's security events without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and update your organization's security events
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's security events without a signed-in user. Also allows the app to update editable properties in security events.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all security incidents
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all security incidents, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write to all security incidents
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write to all security incidents, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read service health
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your tenant's service health information, without a signed-in user. Health information may include service issues or service health overviews.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read service messages
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your tenant's service announcement messages, without a signed-in user. Messages may include information about new or changed features.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read SharePoint and OneDrive tenant settings
Application.adminDescription: Allows the application to read the tenant-level settings of SharePoint and OneDrive, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and change SharePoint and OneDrive tenant settings
Application.adminDescription: Allows the application to read and change the tenant-level settings of SharePoint and OneDrive, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all users' short notes
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all the short notes without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read, create, edit, and delete all users' short notes
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read, create, edit, and delete all the short notes without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Have full control of all site collections
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to have full control of all site collections without a signed in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Create, edit, and delete items and lists in all site collections
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create or delete document libraries and lists in all site collections without a signed in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read items in all site collections
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read documents and list items in all site collections without a signed in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write items in all site collections
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update, and delete documents and list items in all site collections without a signed in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Access selected site collections
Application.adminDescription: Allow the application to access a subset of site collections without a signed in user.  The specific site collections and the permissions granted will be configured in SharePoint Online.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all users' tasks and tasklist
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all users' tasks and task lists in your organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all users' tasks and tasklists
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create, read, update and delete all users' tasks and task lists in your organization, without a signed-in user

Application.adminDisplayName: Create teams
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create teams without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Get a list of all teams
Application.adminDescription: Get a list of all teams, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read the members of all teams
Application.adminDescription: Read the members of all teams, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Add and remove members from all teams
Application.adminDescription: Add and remove members from all teams, without a signed-in user. Also allows changing a team member's role, for example from owner to non-owner.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all users' teamwork activity feed
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all users' teamwork activity feed, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Send a teamwork activity to any user
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create new notifications in users' teamwork activity feeds without a signed in user. These notifications may not be discoverable or be held or governed by compliance policies.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read installed Teams apps for all chats
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the Teams apps that are installed in any chat, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read installed Teams apps for all teams
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the Teams apps that are installed in any team, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read installed Teams apps for all users
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the Teams apps that are installed for any user, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

Application.adminDisplayName: Manage Teams apps for all chats
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps in any chat, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

Application.adminDisplayName: Manage Teams apps for all teams
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps in any team, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

Application.adminDisplayName: Manage Teams apps for all users
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall Teams apps for any user, without a signed-in user. Does not give the ability to read application-specific settings.

Application.adminDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage itself for all chats
Application.adminDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall itself for any chat, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage itself for all teams
Application.adminDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall itself in any team, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Allow the app to manage itself for all users
Application.adminDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall itself to any user, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all teams' settings
Application.adminDescription: Read all team's settings, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and change all teams' settings
Application.adminDescription: Read and change all teams' settings, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Create tabs in Microsoft Teams.
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user. This does not grant the ability to read, modify or delete tabs after they are created, or give access to the content inside the tabs.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read tabs in Microsoft Teams.
Application.adminDescription: Read the names and settings of tabs inside any team in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user. This does not give access to the content inside the tabs.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write tabs in Microsoft Teams.
Application.adminDescription: Read and write tabs in any team in Microsoft Teams, without a signed-in user. This does not give access to the content inside the tabs.

Application.adminDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage all tabs for all chats
Application.adminDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall all tabs for any chat, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage all tabs for all teams
Application.adminDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall all tabs in any team, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage only its own tabs for all chats
Application.adminDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall its own tabs for any chat, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Allow the Teams app to manage only its own tabs for all teams
Application.adminDescription: Allows a Teams app to read, install, upgrade, and uninstall its own tabs in any team, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Create chat and channel messages with anyone's identity and with any timestamp
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create chat and channel messages, without a signed in user. The app specifies which user appears as the sender, and can backdate the message to appear as if it was sent long ago. The messages can be sent to any chat or channel in the organization.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read Teams app settings
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read the Teams app settings without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write Teams app settings
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write the Teams app settings without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read Teams devices
Application.adminDescription: Allow the app to read the management data for Teams devices, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write Teams devices
Application.adminDescription: Allow the app to read and write the management data for Teams devices, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read tags in Teams
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read tags in Teams without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write tags in Teams
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write tags in Teams without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read threat assessment requests
Application.adminDescription: Allows an app to read your organization's threat assessment requests, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Run hunting queries
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to run hunting queries, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all threat indicators
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read all the indicators for your organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Manage threat indicators this app creates or owns
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to create threat indicators, and fully manage those threat indicators (read, update and delete), without a signed-in user.  It cannot update any threat indicators it does not own.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all of the organization's threat submissions
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's threat submissions and to view threat submission policies without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all of the organization's threat submissions
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's threat submissions and threat submission policies without a signed-in user. Also allows the app to create new threat submissions without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all of the organization's threat submission policies
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read your organization's threat submission policies without a signed-in user. Also allows the app to create new threat submission polices without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read trust framework key sets
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read trust framework key set properties without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write trust framework key sets
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write trust framework key set properties without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Enable and disable user accounts
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to enable and disable users' accounts, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Export user's data
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to export data (e.g. customer content or system-generated logs), associated with any user in your company, when the app is used by a privileged user (e.g. a Company Administrator).

Application.adminDisplayName: Invite guest users to the organization
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to invite guest users to the organization, without a signed-in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Manage all users' identities
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read, update and delete identities that are associated with a user's account, without a signed in user. This controls the identities users can sign-in with.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all users' full profiles
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read user profiles without a signed in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all users' basic profiles
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read a basic set of profile properties of other users in your organization without a signed-in user. Includes display name, first and last name, email address, open extensions, and photo.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all users' full profiles
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and update user profiles without a signed in user.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all users' authentication methods
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read authentication methods of all users in your organization, without a signed-in user.                       Authentication methods include things like a user's phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This does not allow the                      app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all users' authentication methods
Application.adminDescription: Allows the application to read and write authentication methods of all users in your organization, without a signed-in user.                       Authentication methods include things like a user's phone numbers and Authenticator app settings. This                      does not allow the app to see secret information like passwords, or to sign-in or otherwise use the authentication methods

Application.adminDisplayName: Read all virtual appointments for users, as authorized by online meetings application access policy
Application.adminDescription: Allows the application to read virtual appointments for all users, without a signed-in user. The app must also be authorized to access an individual user's data by the online meetings application access policy.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read-write all virtual appointments for users, as authorized by online meetings app access policy
Application.adminDescription: Allows the application to read and write virtual appointments for all users, without a signed-in user. The app must also be authorized to access an individual user's data by the online meetings application access policy.

Application.adminDisplayName: Read and write all Windows update deployment settings
Application.adminDescription: Allows the app to read and write all Windows update deployment settings for the organization without a signed-in user.
